website_summaries.verdict: This affordable rubber-coated case is lightweight and form-fitting.  Protects without sacrificing access to ports and functions.
pros: Rubberized finish improves grip and helps prevent drops
Comes in a dazzling array of colors and patterns (including a majestic marble slab) that turn your MacBook into a dazzling beauty
cons: Some durability issues have been raised
Hard to see Apple logo when on

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful top part of case but did not use since the bottom part of case does not clip to laptop. Unfortunately it slides off and unable to use because if it. UPDATE! The bottom fits! You must clip the bottom back first then sides then front in order for it to clip on correctly. I like others just tried clipping front front and sides but did not see bottom clips. So flip it around clip the back first then the sides and front and your good to go ☺️💓
customer_reviews.author: Beas

customer_reviews.title: Dexter's Approval
customer_reviews.text: This laptop case fit perfectly and has a great look. However, it attracts cats. The minute I put it down, Dexter rubbed his face all over it and then proceeded to sit on it. This case is perfect for cat lovers and terrible for those with cat allergies.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Moccia

customer_reviews.title: wish it didn't break so quickly.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this, specifically because its so pretty and light. However, the case broke of on 2 corners within a week. Very sad. I've only carried it between home and office in a bag by itself and I'm pretty gentle with my belongings. Perhaps I just got a defective case, but disappointing nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Ida

customer_reviews.title: and the case is beautiful. Quick to snap on and fits my Macbook ...
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast, and the case is beautiful. Quick to snap on and fits my Macbook 13' air perfectly. Customer service was quick to reply with any questions. However I would be wary with the actual product. I received the item damaged (the bottom edge of the case was broken off) and the bottom gets dirty easily and is difficult to clean. For $20 its a pretty good deal but even then for $20 I would expect better quality. Probably wouldn't buy again and I'd advise to purchase with caution.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: In love
customer_reviews.text: This fit my 13" Macbook Air perfectly. It is so pretty. Sometimes I'll just close my laptop while I'm doing something just to look at it. It has some of my favorite wildflowers on it. The fit and quality seem nice. I just got it so I'm not sure how it will hold up over time, but it seems sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Turner

customer_reviews.title: Best of both worlds!
customer_reviews.text: This is honestly an amazing case. I just got a new MacBook, and I spent a lot of money on this beautiful laptop, so I didn't want to cover it up with a case! (but I still wanted it to look cute!) This case is the best of both worlds because the majority of it is clear and shows the body of the laptop and the reflective apple! But! It still has the super cute accent design of the flowers on the front! Definitely recommend! This case will make your MacBook look beautiful while protecting it!
customer_reviews.author: lavonnedang

customer_reviews.title: Tasteful design and affordable!! Yay!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect. I was struggling to find a design I like that was subtle but still very much me. Just purchased a new 13" macbook pro (rip my bank account) so this was a very personal thing. I fell in love with the green wildflower case. Ugh thank you so much for having such a tasteful design. It shows up just fine on the space gray. Affordable and case fits perfectly. For the bottom if you are challenged like me make sure you put in the part near the hinge first.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia C

customer_reviews.title: Try a different brand.
customer_reviews.text: This product is beautiful to look at. I love the front cover. Unfortunately, the back cover doesn’t have a way to really stay on. It has the little clippy part in front but not on the sides so the back won’t stay put. I had to use the back from a different product. Also, on Amazon it states it’s for product A1989. The product itself doesn’t say that. So it’s questionable if it’s even suitable for the lates MacPro w touch bar.
customer_reviews.author: Jemma Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Best ever...
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually write reviews, but I cannot tell you how many awful laptop covers I have had. This one is gorgeous and hasn't cracked yet as the last one maybe lasted 2 months and cracked right away. I got the garden flower pattern and it is sooooo pretty. I absolutely love it. It also arrived quickly. Update-months later still no cracks. I am not sure about why the marble one (reviews say) cracks, but this one hasn't. I love it and it looks SO pretty.
customer_reviews.author: MyFiona

customer_reviews.title: Scuff free laptop
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty careful when it comes to handling my laptop but you can't be too sure. I would still be careful when it comes to dropping your laptop as this is just a hard plastic clip-on shell, but it works great against scuffs, wear & tear, and any accidental dings on the MacBooks sharp edges. If you do drop your MacBook with this, expect it to be a sacrificial case as hardshell cases would just fracture. The bottom plate is straightforward to install, but be aware of the lid plate and watch where it clips on. I had mine upside down... This made my MacBook more discreet and looks aesthetically pleasing
customer_reviews.author: Marc Choa

customer_reviews.title: The most beautiful cover ever.
customer_reviews.text: I got a new computer. I didn't like it because of the size and how light and unstable it was on my lap. I hoped that I could like it much better after receiving this cover. It arrived and looked exactly like the photo. I don't know about durability, but it is much thicker than other single color covers I have had. I can't see the Apple through it when on. I now love my computer, it is so beautiful, and best of all, it is now more stable and doesn't feel like it will slide off my lap.
customer_reviews.author: LeslieA.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Protection for My Mac
customer_reviews.text: McKayla is my MacBook Pro. Of course, I name my Mac. I spend more time with her than with friends. I have two of these beautiful covers and they make me smile whenever I look at them. They look handprinted and are suitably secure for the top cover. I don't use the bottom one. Sort of heats up McKayla, even with the open slats. I invite the manufacturer to add a couple more "snaps" on the lid. There are two; there should be four. Neither cover stayed on at first, had to fiddle with them both until finally they did. Even with that fiddly bit, they are still worth five stars. I really love them.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Ellen Allen

customer_reviews.title: We'll see.....
customer_reviews.text: This 'Hard Case' does have the matte finish that I wanted, to help prevent my MacBook Air from slipping out of my hands. It does however, have an unfortunate amount of small granules of something, within the cover. It is almost like sand or dirt got into the mix, by mistake! You can feel the occasional bump, whenever your hand touches it. I just hope they don't rub off or come loose, and mess up the matte finish. I would return it for a replacement, but need to use it now while on a trip. For now, I'll have to give it just 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: GVGIRL

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought this case for my Macbook Pro 13 inch retina, and I absolutely love it! It's a clear hardshell so you can still see the apple logo shine through the design. I recommend this case to anyone who is looking for something that is attractive yet durable! I wasn't expecting much with this case, but I was completely surprised at how nicely the design came out on the case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for tablet cases when I saw this and wondered, "Why have I never put a case on my most valuable possession -- my laptop?" I bought it and it was easy to snap on and has lasted well. It has a matte finish which makes the laptop easier to grab onto. I carry my laptop everywhere -- often working at home or in my office, but also working all over in courthouses and parking lots, coffee houses and in my camper. Having something keep it safer simply makes sense. Also, if you have multiple family members or co-workers with the same laptop, a cover can avoid that embarrassing problem of picking up the wrong laptop!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Clark

customer_reviews.title: Fits the new 2019 Macbook Pro!
customer_reviews.text: I have the 2019 Macbook Pro 13 inch with touch bar and this case fits perfectly. It looks so nice, the graphics are high quality, and do not chip. I originally ordered a different pattern and received the wrong size. I was able to return it the next day (thanks to Amazon/UPS pickup) and ordered a different style in hopes it would be the correct size and it was. Very happy with my new case. Very thin as well. Not sure I would trust this to stand up against a hard fall, but a shortfall onto the carpet or protecting from scratches and this case is your guy.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline’s Reviews

customer_reviews.title: I can't say enough good things about this case
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good things about this case. I was concerned that it would be somewhat bulkier than I hoped for it's perfect. It snaps on snugly and stays in place. At first, my computer kept sliding out of the bottom case so I turned it over and noticed that it wasn't snapped on where the screen meets the body. I pressed a little harder and it snapped right in. So if the case slides off the top or bottom, make sure it's snapped in near all four corners and you shouldn't have a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: I had a case similar to this for my old MacBook Pro laptop and it was great. I didn't have to worry about the laptop ...
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased the new 2017 MacBook Pro with the Touch Bar a couple of weeks ago and knew it would be essential to get a case for this laptop. I had a case similar to this for my old MacBook Pro laptop and it was great. I didn't have to worry about the laptop getting scratched or worn out. This definitely gives me peace of mind in knowing my laptop is protected against wear and tear of regular use. The case is also easy to put on, once you get it hooked on the one side. The bottom section took me a couple of tries to get it snapped in place, but once I did, it stayed in place.
customer_reviews.author: J. Pelegrin

customer_reviews.title: Works well and can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.text: It fits well on my computer and does a good job so far keeping it safe from scratches, etc. I had a different brand in the past that fell apart after a few months, so I am hoping this one does not do the same. So far so good (one month in)! It looks nice on my computer and I much prefer the matte finish to a glossy plastic, however it does show EVERY fingerprint and smudge on the case. : / It drives my OCD nuts. Maybe the lighter colors wouldn't show as bad (I got the dark/navy blue).
customer_reviews.author: J5Jeri

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this case, sturdy and cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is actually my second case, in the exact same print. I broke my first one because I was a total klutz and dropped my laptop (it was fine thank god) but the case broke in the corner, so obviously it did its job and protected my computer really well which was great! The little nick in the corner was just annoying so I ordered a new one right away. Arrived perfectly and quick, now I have my favorite cute case back on my laptop and its safe again! Really a good quality product, the material is thick and sturdy but not too bulky either, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: It's beautiful and came in a timely manner - the sellers ...
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful and came in a timely manner - the sellers are great! That being said.... it simply didn't fit properly. I had the correct model number and while it fit all the corners and stayed on snug, the top part of the case was raised (about half an inch between the computer and the case). It still did its job, but it drove me mad, so I returned it. Edit: The sellers saw my review and have offered me a replacement at no cost, as they believe I received a defective item (I sure hope it was just defective, these cases are stinking cute!!). I will update again once I have received the item.
customer_reviews.author: Jade L.

customer_reviews.title: I love the way the case looks
customer_reviews.text: I love the way the case looks. It's super sleek but still fun. I have has it for about 5 months now and it is definilty starting to show wear. parts of the bottom are falling off so it isn't really sticking on anymore and it leaves a small crack between the case and the bottom of the laptop so it still allows the laptop to get dirty. All in all, its a toss up. It isn't the best but it's a good product. It just depends on whether or not your willing to buy something that may not last for a super long time. I personally, will probably buy it again when my current one deteriorates more.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Jeannine Wallace

customer_reviews.title: It was good while it lasted...
customer_reviews.text: I got this in the mail last year sometime and was in love. It was gorgeous, and seemingly good quality. About a month after I purchased this, the bottom case broke to the point I could no longer use it. I was upset, mostly because I am not rough with my computer. It travels in a computer case and lives on my desk. I had no idea why the little clips broke off the bottom part of the case. Now, the top is broken and I'm pretty upset because it is right at a year. Definitely purchase this case if you plan on swapping it out yearly. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Toof

customer_reviews.title: Fits Perfectly, but MUST CLICK IN THE BACK PIECE.
customer_reviews.text: Along the back edge of the bottom piece, close to the hinges of the computer, you MUST click the two tiny plastic pieces in that are along the edge, or else the bottom shell will feel super loose, and as though it doesn't quite fit. Quality is as I expected for the price. I love the wildflower pattern and rubber grippies on the bottom are very effective. Doesn't feel like a super durable plastic, but I don't plan to travel much with my computer. Fits my needs perfectly and I love the price.
customer_reviews.author: emmett e cruey

customer_reviews.title: Be careful when ordering!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize that this was a "case", since my search parameters was for "Stickers" for the back. It is for older macbook air, so it doesn't fit anyway. I can't speak to whether it is durable or not, but my advice is make sure it is what you are looking for AND that it is the size you need! I would send it back, but for $10 it doesn't seem worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great for the first few weeks
customer_reviews.text: I loved the product for the first month or so. The design is adorable and it did a good job of keeping the scratches off of my computer. However, after a few months of wear, the rubber grips started falling off, and the case itself was full of scratches. Also, it collected lots of dirt and grime between the case and the computer, which scratched the computer on the edges. I ended up throwing the product away, and I'm replacing it with a zip up sleeve.
customer_reviews.author: Romeo Joseph B. Rosal

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to get off
customer_reviews.text: This case is nearly impossible to get off. I have had it on my laptop for going on 2 years, simply because I cannot get it to come off without breaking a nail. It has protected my laptop and the print is pretty, however. It has chipped in a few places but other than that, has held together well.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty case
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had me order this to replace a case she already had on her macbook pro because it was dirty and hard to clean. This feels like it will be easy to clean. I think the purpose of this is more to protect it from scratches than from falls but she's happy with it. If it were me, I would have chosen something that had more cushion but that's just me.
customer_reviews.author: BeeHappy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister's birthday gift and it was my mom that was fawning over it the most. She said the colors look gorgeous and the case itself was light. Unfortunately I bought the wrong size for her laptop so she had to return it. I haven't asked her since then about how it was working out for her but knowing her she would have griped about it as soon as she got the chance if it didn't work out.
customer_reviews.author: Mishi Mo

customer_reviews.title: but showed bad customer service
customer_reviews.text: the cover shows finger prints and the bottom piece does not stay on the laptop, defective design for a MacBook Pro 2017 with touch-bar laptop. Contacted the seller, but showed bad customer service, I love his automated messages that leads to no where
customer_reviews.author: wanna see it

customer_reviews.title: Looked really nice for a while...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this about nine months and now it needs replacement. Plastic cracked within the first couple of months of use just under the trackpad. That was fine and the case was still usable. Now it's cracked in so many places it's looking pretty shabby. Next to go was one of the rubberized feet. Bear in mind that I'm not a rough user of my computer. This is normal wear and tear. Please don't buy this as it will go to the landfill before it's had much of a useful life.
customer_reviews.author: Tuula

customer_reviews.title: Perfect inexpensive cover that protects with a bit of style.
customer_reviews.text: Item is as described. It fits very snug and definitely has a soft subtle feel for being a hard plastic cover. No odd smell and most importantly Zero defects! I looked at many different covers and I wanted something to protect my Macbook Pro, especially after spending the $$$ to have it refurbished after a liquid spill accident. Fits my MacBook Pro 13 Inch with Retina Display (A1502) perfectly. I would definitely buy from seller again!
customer_reviews.author: RocB

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Overall Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I love the design, its printed very clear on the case and is very unique as I've never seen anyone else with one like it. The only thing preventing it from getting 5 stars is that the bottom case isn't snapped on super well as it sometimes slides off. Overall this is a great case though and has kept my Mac protected for about a year!
customer_reviews.author: Bri Masters

customer_reviews.title: While I love the pattern
customer_reviews.text: While I love the pattern, the price and the fit of the cover, I am concerned about the edges of the cover. ALL of the edges are frayed! Given my routine handling of the device, I don't have a high degree of confidence that the cover will stand up to what I consider to be normal wear and tear. Surely that is an issue that can be successfully addressed for all customers??
customer_reviews.author: jean phillips truscott

customer_reviews.title: I really love the flower case cover it looks great on my ...
customer_reviews.text: I really love the flower case cover it looks great on my laptop! Just what I wanted! However, the reason I'm not IN LOVE is that it arrived damaged. One of the bottom corners is missing so that's a bit of a bummer especially since that's a significant exposed corner and the point it to be pretty but also protect my laptop! All in all, not bad it is very much like the picture!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle & Emily

customer_reviews.title: SO WORTH IT
customer_reviews.text: This case is so gorgeous and I have gotten so many compliments. I have been using it for a few months now and have had no problems whatsoever. It is really great quality! It is hard to take off but I'd rather have that then have it falling off. I can't stress enough how pretty it is!!! Definitely get it if you're thinking about it. :)
customer_reviews.author: Molly Fenske

customer_reviews.title: I get compliments on this all the time.
customer_reviews.text: I love the beauty of this case. I'm not sure how I missed that it's a clear background, but fortunately I have the Space color for a Mac. I struggled a bit with getting the bottom part properly seated and GMYLE was very helpful. I found I needed to seat the clips nearest the screen first and then snap in the clips closer to the space bar. It's only been a couple weeks, but so far it's doing great.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: I love the design
customer_reviews.text: So firstly, I love the design, and it was easy to put on. That being said, it isn't a perfect airtight fit on the bottom of my 2015 MacBook Pro with Retina (13").I can feel the bottom shift when I pick it up, and some crumbs, dust and whatever else have already wedged into the front by where you open the lid of the computer. I do have easy access to all ports, and it does have slits for ventilation. Overall I think it will protect from scuffs and scratches, but not falls or drops.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Shuff

customer_reviews.title: Can't believe how pretty this is!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and much better quality than expected. Lightweight but sturdy. The colors on the graphics are vibrant, bold and clean. The top snapped on easily; the bottom took a bit of work, but once I got it in the right place, it also snapped on well. It's a little slick so you have to be careful carrying it. It fit my 2015, 13-inch MacBook Air perfect! Thinking about buying a second so I can swap the tops depending on my mood. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: dcc

customer_reviews.title: Bottom doesn't fit!
customer_reviews.text: The top fits perfectly. The bottom slides off. It doesn't lock on or fit properly at all. It is a shame, because I really like the top.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Classy Case
customer_reviews.text: The coolest laptop case around. I love the feel of the soft plastic. The marble design is super awesome and I get compliments on it everyday. With the case, people can't tell that the computer is a Mac or at least they are initially thrown off so I get a lot of comments like, "Woah, what kind of computer is THAT!?" The case looks very class and expensive. Great price point for it. Would recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Neen

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite case that I’ve ever had for my laptop. It’s kept the computer safe, and it is really, really cute. I get compliments all the time! I love that you still get the “look” of the Mac, but in a unique (and protective) way. Also, I’ve had this for almost 3 years and it’s in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe R

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit the computer
customer_reviews.text: I opened the package to put on my new Macbook Pro 13" with touchbar and it doesn't even extend to the back corners of the computer. It doesn't fit this size computer. I'm immediately returning the item.
customer_reviews.author: Storm

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous cover!
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased an expensive big-brand cover for my Macbook, but after two covers cracking and breaking in a short time, I decided to try this one. The colors are gorgeous and the matte finish feels great. It's not going to give a lot of protection in case of a drop, except no scratches, but I don't think that even the other case I had would do the same. Overall, very happy with my cover! PS - the Apple logo is not visible, if that is important to you.
customer_reviews.author: Girrllygurl

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but questionable quality.
customer_reviews.text: I would have liked it because the colors are pretty but the item arrived broken. If it already has a crack and a piece missing it makes me wonder how it would hold up over time with use. UPDATE: I got a replacement after my first order arrived broken and the new laptop cover lasted 6 months before cracking.
customer_reviews.author: BMisey

customer_reviews.title: Fields of Wild Flowers
customer_reviews.text: It is such a me moment, love this product and will order again. The flowers are beautiful and remind me of field flowers from my youth. The product snapped into place, and it feels secure. It has been four months, the feet have not fallen off like other cases. I was worried about the clear plastic and the withstanding of the clarity as time went on, no problems. Well done!
customer_reviews.author: GH

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely impressed with this case Previously, I invested in a speck case, thinking the price and name would mean quality. Boy was I wrong. In comparison, this case is significantly sturdier. My previous case broke within a month, this one is solid and has no sign of wear a month out. I highly recommend this case!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This has been one of my favorite cases for all of the Macbooks I have owned. I always buy cases from Gmyle. The quality is always great. I've had this case for almost 8 months and still have yet to see any scratches, cracks or discoloration on the case.
customer_reviews.author: Luz M

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS CASE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am in LOVE with this case!!!! I have the MacBook Air (model num: A1466) and this case fits it perfectly. It is such a beautiful case and seems to be good quality. Just stunning!! I also especially liked how this case was double wrapped, which prevented it from getting scrathched up during the shipping process.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful But Already Ugly :(
customer_reviews.text: I love the item! It’s beautiful and very elegant. However, I am quite heartbroken that despite it being sealed upon receipt, the clear case I received already had multiple scratches and scruff marks thereby making it already very marred and ugly. Honestly, I expected more from anything from Amazon, also since the item is supposedly branded and a bit pricey. But I feel like I got a poor or rejected stock of it. So yeah, I wanted to give a perfect rating but it service-wise this really fell short. :(
customer_reviews.author: Miss Moppet

customer_reviews.title: Low image quality
customer_reviews.text: The print is beautiful, the flowers are stunning but the image quality is not the best. You can clearly see the blurry image and even a little pixelated from the stretch. I am currently using this case because it is not a big deal and as a cover its actually pretty goos, sturdy and clips perfectly but the print is not the best.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: good price but heavy design and not durable
customer_reviews.text: This case is cute and a good price but adds significant weight to my macbook air. It's also lacking in durability. this is the 3rd case i've bought in 3 years- pretty much breaks after 1 year of constant use. overall an okay product if you're not looking for anything fancy.
customer_reviews.author: Dave L.

customer_reviews.title: In love with this case
customer_reviews.text: In love with this case!! It is exactly like the picture. Colors are spot on. It makes my laptop a little heavy but that is expected with any case. I would totally buy this again in a heartbeat! I've attached pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this cute computer case
customer_reviews.text: I love this cute computer case. The grippies on the bottom help my computer to stay in place on any surface. I was surprised that for being a white case it has not gotten dirty over the last few months that I have been using it. It stays in place on my computer even with the subtle/small clasps that it attaches by. Part of the plastic on the back bottom of the case has chipped off, but the case is still functional and I am very hard on my computer.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Brosnan

customer_reviews.title: The color is really pretty and relatively speaking
customer_reviews.text: The color is really pretty and relatively speaking, I think the quality of this keyboard case is much better than my previous case from the company iXCC (the corner of the case cracked after a few months of use). We just received this in the mail and we have yet to see the durability. Also, the installation went smoothly, easily snapping onto the MacBook Air. Will recommend this to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Judy H.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!! Warps screen
customer_reviews.text: I installed this just on the top part/back of screen of my MacBook Air and it seemed to fit. I didn't use the bottom piece. After a few weeks I noticed that the screen was warped and the top doesn't close anymore! I removed the cover, but too late. My screen is now warped permanently.
customer_reviews.author: Lve2Exp

customer_reviews.title: Protects quite well
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure how I feel about this case. I misunderstood and thought it was latex. it does make my laptop heavier I think. So, I may decide to use it at home, but not when I'm carrying it out and about. I haven't actually tested the weight; I just feel like it is heavier. It fits perfectly, easy to take on and off and the design is lovely.
customer_reviews.author: JoCatherine

customer_reviews.title: There’s hope
customer_reviews.text: Stained Update 1/10/19 Contacted customer service and they sent me a replacement free if any charges. This case is really beautiful and will hold up well. obviously its not really made for anything else except to protect from scratches but I absolutely love it and the Gmyle customer service was great!!
customer_reviews.author: alyssa herrera

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and feels more expensive than it actually is
customer_reviews.text: My wife is completely into this marble look on everything from her phone to now her computer but it does look great and has a really nice soft texture. Is not cheap looking or feeling. And it does make the computer look exactly like it does in the picture. So if this is the look you’re after I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Erick

customer_reviews.title: Love the marble pattern
customer_reviews.text: Great case for the New Macbook WITHOUT touchbar. This won't fit on the earlier models either (have tried on my old macbook and it's way too small). Pattern on the top is beautiful and the case itself is smooth. I found the design to be unique and also a bit eccentric hence my choice with this case. A heads up is that the bottom doesn't have the marble design and is completely white. So far it looks good and I've had GMYLE cases in the past that have held up over the years. Good investment for protection against scratches and dings!
customer_reviews.author: Shiberu

customer_reviews.title: Cute, durable, and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: The case itself is absolutely stunning! I received so many compliments on the design of this case. The design is just as pictured. It is so easy to clean, and incredibly durable. My MacBook fell from my bed which is about 20 inches tall, and fell on tile floor and there was no crack, and most importantly my computer was totally fine!
customer_reviews.author: vaness

customer_reviews.title: Love this case
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this case so much!! It’s just so pretty makes me proud of myself for buying it honestly. I want to buy another case from this company but I’m just so in love with the celestial one I bought. I have no words, I feel like it’s me on my computer, I feel so proud of having this on my MacBook!
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle Peralta

customer_reviews.title: Good quality plastic
customer_reviews.text: So cute! Good quality plastic; it's thick and hard. I'm so happy! Edit: The bottom part is separate from the top cover. I took mine off because it made my computer lose air ventilation. I knew this because I heard the fan harder than usual with the bottom cover on. I don't know if there is any alternative to protect the bottom of your laptop, but this case was not ventilating properly.
customer_reviews.author: Umama C.

customer_reviews.title: Cool looking protection for my precious MacBook
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a cute case to protect my new baby, so I ordered this before I even got my MacBook Pro. Although the color isn't quite as vibrant as I'd expected, the cover still looks really neat and fits the computer perfectly. It doesn't add a lot of bulk to the machine and allows it to keep its sleek look. I was happy to discover I can still see the apple light through the galaxy - you might not like this but I think it looks cool. I also use a neoprene sleeve to protect my precious, so I can't say whether or not it would take a lot of abuse. It works well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Great design, protects from scratches, feels durable
customer_reviews.text: This does what it should - clips into place, protects my MacBook from scratches. I was careful putting on the case, as the clips are very thin due to the thin nature of this computer. This case definitely isn’t made to protect a computer from a fall, but it can at least protect a computer from scratches. Made of a durable plastic, but I won’t be surprised if it cracks at some point. The white “feet” on the bottom of the case have a better grip than the ones that come with the MacBook, which is a plus. The design on this is also beautiful, clear, and makes my computer look great.
customer_reviews.author: Tanner Miller

customer_reviews.title: The top makes the lid pretty heavy, so when you tilt it downward
customer_reviews.text: This case is cute as can be, but its not practical. The top makes the lid pretty heavy, so when you tilt it downward, it just falls into the keyboard. The bottom makes it difficult to plug in headphones. I had to take the corner of the case off to use mine. The part that's inconveniencing me the most right now: removal. This product comes with a removal card, which I have damaged attempting to get the lid off of my laptop. I'm afraid I'm going to break either my screen or the case. The bottom came off easily, though.
customer_reviews.author: S. M.

customer_reviews.title: Fits well
customer_reviews.text: Fits well for the appropriate product, but can slide off if you are not careful. It looks kind of tacky/cheap on an expensive apple computer, but maybe that will dissuade the thieves from trying to rip you off. It should provide some measure of protection for the computer which is what I wanted for a fairly reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Bueno

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful case, quality and fit is slightly too large for my MacBook Air....
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful case, really gave life to my MacBook. This case makes the MacBook slightly heavier so if you are looking for something sleek I would not recommend this case. The bottom piece does not fit extremely well, tends to pop off in specific places. The quality of this product is decent, you really just get what you pay for. Would I recommend it for personal flare/style? Yes definitely. Durability? Yes. Design/Fit? Somewhat. The colors are bright and vibrant. The plastic piece covers the USB ports on my MacBook on the left side slightly.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Lynn Williams

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and works really well!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a little late writing this review but I wanted to use it before reviewing! I bought this case over a year ago and use my laptop every single day and take it with me everywhere. This has done a good job protecting it and the case still looks brand new. No fading or chipping of the design at all, I would DEFINITELY recommend this case!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Nice case for what it’s worth!
customer_reviews.text: Could be a bit more durable because corners cracked after a couple months of basic usage and case became very yellow as well even though I keep it clean. But otherwise a pretty case for the first couple months!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous pattern, sturdy case
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, there's not much else to say that hasn't already been said, but this is an absolutely gorgeous case for my MacBook Air. The floral pattern is lovely, unobtrusive, and feels really unique in comparison to other cases. The case is sturdy - I haven't dropped my MacBook yet (thankfully), but it doesn't add a lot of weight to my computer, and doesn't have a hard time snapping on or off.
customer_reviews.author: coffeescripting

customer_reviews.title: Its plastic. Oh well
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had one. Lasted 4 years of college but now its broken and shes careful with her electronics. She wanted another one. Same one. Hope this piece of plastic for $13 doesn’t break. Go China
customer_reviews.author: Dom

customer_reviews.title: After Three Years
customer_reviews.text: I bought this three years ago and I am still using it. Has not broken and I have been getting compliments about it since day 1. It prevents my computer from getting scratches. Maybe the only bad thing (really not that bad) is that dirt naturally gets inside the case (like any other case you will buy) but its really not that noticeable. Before this case, I had another one that I bought from a different seller which lasted one year before it started breaking apart. I love this one. Honestly, you won't regret it
customer_reviews.author: Jannet

customer_reviews.title: Cute and protective, but broke after less than a year
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for about a year and the last few months it has been completely broken so that the covers keep falling off. For a while it was really good and very cute! I get lots of compliments on it, I just wish it had held up a little better. That being said, I am a student and and always using my computer on the go, so it's gotten lots of use
customer_reviews.author: Alaina Kahn

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking Case
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived without any damage. It snapped onto my macbook air 13' so easily. I love the cover and have had compliments about the case. If you wanted a case that showcases the apple logo, this one won't really do it. The apple logo only shows through if your screen brightness is all the way up and if you are like me and hardly ever have your screen brightness to full power, then the apple logo will rarely be seen. The material itself is smooth and nice to the touch. I can't speak to the durability or lasting power of the case itself since I've only had my case on my macbook for a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: I love love love this case
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this case. It fit my macbook pro retina 2014 perfect and it feels so nice to the touch. I love the floral pattern, it repels the males in my family away from my MB, LOL. It arrived in lightening speed. it is vey well made and the packaging was top notch. This case was double the price on eBay. I love Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: worldpeace247

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute BUT........
customer_reviews.text: I feared for my laptops life so i bought this case, it looked cute and thought it would protect it. So the installation was fairly easy except the bottom attachment was tricky so it kind of broke but i didn't really care because i only cared about the top. maybe a month it the top attachment started to slip off from time to time and i thought it would be fine. Then one fatal day my lap top fell out of my hand and hit the floor, i picked it up and to surprise there was a CRACK in the top of my mac. But it's cute so whatever you know.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny

customer_reviews.title: I love this cover
customer_reviews.text: I love this cover ! It fit perfectly on my MacBook Pro 13. It gives it a distinctive look thats great. Having read the reviews before I purchased it I was concerned about the small minority of reviews that said it offer no protection or cracked. I found it to be protection enough. I just don't drop my laptop period. If it does fall this might offer some amount of protection but bottom line is this is for looks which are great but not protection. It does protect the outer surface of the laptop from scuffs and liquids.
customer_reviews.author: cdjr398

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING! I have had it for 7 r so ...
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING! I have had it for 7 r so months now and it is still holding up, has its color, and has actually been dropped a few times. Did a great job of protecting the corners or my computer. It did chip a bit on the corner but did a great job protecting my computer and the case didn't even crack.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Metz

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely case! It's sturdy and snaps right into place-- definitely very protective! It comes with two pieces, so both the top and bottom of the laptop will be covered. The bottom side of the case has four grips in all corners to ensure that the laptop won't wiggle or move when you're working and typing! I love the hardshell, plastic cover with the beautiful floral design, plus it looks great with my gold laptop! 10/10 recommend to anyone looking for a cute, affordable, and sturdy case!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Expected better quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a BEAUTIFUL case that I get compliments on every time I take it out in class or meetings. Unfortunately, the other day I saw a little chip in it even though there's been no rough play involved (i haven't dropped it or anything). And occasionally, I have to snap the case back into place because for some reason it moves. And also, the little black parts on the bottom that hold it from sliding on surfaces keep coming off, so I took off two stars for all those reasons. But still, it's very pretty especially with the apple sign glowing in the front.
customer_reviews.author: Sabatani Shetu

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken.
customer_reviews.text: Super upset!! Starting classes next week and was very excited for this to arrive....but when it did the bottom tab was broken, and won't stay on my computer property. I contacted the seller directly and they replied that they are out of stock of the item so wouldn't be able to send a replacement. Besides the malfunction, the overall design was beautiful and as described, just wish they would double check the items before sending out.
customer_reviews.author: Arrielle Arrayan

customer_reviews.title: Way too big.
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit my new MacBook. Did not snap together. Looks as though some pieces are missing. Cannot return it because there is no UPS store here. Need them to include a return label.
customer_reviews.author: william whitaker

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t really care for this case, it’s too heavy for the top of my MacBook Air to stay put, it makes it fall backwards so I always have to have a water bottle or something behind it if I want the screen pushed back a certain distance
customer_reviews.author: Mauri Diane

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but slippery
customer_reviews.text: BEAUTIFUL case. However, the only thing I wish where different is the exterior. I was hoping that it would be rubberized, like my other MacBook covers, so that it wouldn't be so slippery. I'm afraid the computer might slip out of my hands and drop as I'm taking it out of my bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Super lightweight with a really nice soft silicone style finish. Mine came with two but that’s fine because now i get to give one to a friend! It also gives me a little reassurance that my laptop will stay a little protected and safe from scratches and cracks!
customer_reviews.author: Anika

customer_reviews.title: Super cute & easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I love this case!! I've had many different cases over the years, but this one is the cutest one I've ever had. The printing on it is gorgeous. It was easy to install and it stays on with no issues. It appears to be a high quality case. I hope it holds up, but if it doesn't they have a great warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Kari & Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but not really protective!
customer_reviews.text: Had this for a few months now. It’s done my Macbook well and it’s also very cute. You can barely see the Apple logo shining through but other than that it’s super cute. However, after having it for a while the case did start to yellow a little bit and things from the bottom fell off, but other than that it’s really no biggie! It’s trendy and super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I recently upgraded my Mac and knew I needed a case to keep it safe. I was on the search for a floral one and LOVE that the case is clear, but the flowers are easy to see. I get lots of compliments. It fit my A1989 perfectly. (I think I had to pop it on the back first before the front of the Mac).
customer_reviews.author: A Sch

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: The pattern looks nice but it breaks very easily. The corner started to peel off right away and then eventually broke off in one of the most vulnerable spots for a laptop to be dropped on. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: nlf

customer_reviews.title: The design is pretty but it does not compensate for the broken plastic ...
customer_reviews.text: The case has not held well at all especially the bottom piece. The edges are broken and I only put it in my backpack and take it out of my backpack. The design is pretty but it does not compensate for the broken plastic bottom. The rubber pieces on each corner have fallen off, and the plastic pieces that are supposed to hold the bottom together are completely broken off. This is the second case that I have ordered and it basically only lasted me 2 months each time. This product needs to be fixed, because I take very good care of my computer and this shouldn't be happening. I am really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not look like on the picture.
customer_reviews.text: When it came I was very dissapointed because barely looked like the one on the picture. The colors were to bright when I was going for more neutral colors like it was shown. It also did not have a small opening around where the apple was supposed to be shown, it was covered by flowers. But it still looks cute and it was deformed but fitted perfectly fine.It had a lot of visible scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This was a false advertisement, it definitely did not fit my A1466 macbook air, it was extremely disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: I love this case
customer_reviews.text: I love this case! It is beautiful in person and protects the outside of my computer well. Wasn't ever a fan of the bottom piece but realized that it's broken so I just do without the bottom part. I just love the top though!
customer_reviews.author: Cara J. Gerber

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love This!
customer_reviews.text: This case is beautiful. The printing is layered giving a 3-d effect. The colors are bright and cheerful. The case fits tightly on my laptop and offers some security. I am very happy with this purchase and recommend this product highly.
customer_reviews.author: Emily C.

customer_reviews.title: lasted 8 months without damage, still serves its purpose with light use
customer_reviews.text: So its lasted 9 months without any issues. I have put a clear coat on the front of the design to protect it. I mostly have used it in my home taking it sometimes to school, today it has cracked along the edge it is still holding up but cracked. still doing its job but just a little flimsy, but it is very pretty. I enjoyed it and have gotten many complements on it while I have used it. I will probably invest in a different one, this has served its purpose. probably best for light use at home.
customer_reviews.author: christina m

customer_reviews.title: great case
customer_reviews.text: I have had a few of the plastic shell cases for my MacBook. Most crack after some use. This one seems durable. It has taken some ill treatment and come away in good shape. Not much money spent for good protection and stays looking good.
customer_reviews.author: @michaelharrison

customer_reviews.title: Good product quality poor print job
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case to replace another case i bought years ago. This case feels sturdy and thick, high quality plastic was definitely used. However, the designed looks as though it was printed on a cheap sticker material. There is no coating on top of the design so it has a rough feeling to the touch. Overall I am happy with the product but feel I could have bought a regular computer case and placed stickers on it myself and ended up with a similar result.
customer_reviews.author: Hope O.

customer_reviews.title: i like it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this about a year ago. the print came out vibrant and like in the picture. I get so many compliments on it! However, after a while, the little white stands underneath it popped off and there's glue residue that was left behind. Other than that, it's a cute case. Keep in mind that the case will make it harder to plug in large USB adapters on the side. You may want to consider getting an adapter with a chord instead of one that is flush to the computer bc of this case
customer_reviews.author: Kayly & Josiah

customer_reviews.title: do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I should have returned this immediately. I was not too happy with the color upon receiving. But I was sympathetic with the seller. Anyway, it’s cracked. Only 2 months after purchase. I did not even bring my laptop outside the house.
customer_reviews.author: Coco Kokiatso

product_meta.title: GMYLE MacBook Air 13 Inch Case A1466 A1369 Old Version 2010 2017, Hard Shell Plastic Clear Crystal Glossy Snap On Cover (Tropical Floral)
feature_bullets: The case Only fits MacBook Air 13 Inch No CD-ROM (A1369/A1466, Version 2017/2016/2015/2014/2013/2012/2011/2010/2009/2008), NO Cut Out design, transparency is different from color to color.
Please kindly check the model number "A1xxx" on the back of the Macbook before your purchase. NOT Compatible with any other MacBook models.
Protects your Macbook from accidental hard knocks and scratches. Fully access to all buttons and features. Plug your charger, cable or headset without removing the case.
Simple clip-on/off design without the added risk of harming your laptop during application.
Snap on design, easy on and off; Fully vented for heat disbursement.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars3,827 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
